alert.note: Alert for Minnehaha (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 05 at 8:41PM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota... Split Rock Creek near Corson affecting Minnehaha County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Split Rock Creek near Corson. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, the parking lot at the racetrack may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 7.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 9.8 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 8.5 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 PM CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Split Rock Creek Corson 8.5 7.5 Tue 8 PM 5.3 3.3 3.1 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday evening at 1145 PM CDT.
